TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConfigurationErrorsException extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationException
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ConfigurationErrorsException extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationException

summary.span: 发生配置错误时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a configuration error has occurred.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当读取或写入配置信息时，如果发生任何错误，则会引发异常。The exception is thrown when any error occurs while configuration information is being read or written. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个自定义节，并 在修改其属性时生成异常。The following code example creates a custom section and generates a exception when it modifies its properties. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException/CS/ConfigurationErrorsException.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException/VB/ConfigurationErrorsException.vb#1)] 下面的示例是上一个示例使用的配置摘录。The following example is a configuration excerpt used by the previous example. ```xml
```

public: virtual property System::String ^ BareMessage { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取对引发此配置异常的原因的说明。

span.span: Gets a description of why this configuration exception was thrown.

value.span: 对引发此 的原因的说明。

span.span: A description of why this was thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不包含配置文件的名称或发生此异常的行号 。The property does not contain the name of the configuration file or the line number at which this exception occurred. 如果需要包含配置文件的名称和行号以及消息的消息，请使用 属性。If you want a message that contains the name of the configuration file and the line number, along with the message, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取 属性值。The following code example shows how to get the property value. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException/CS/ConfigurationErrorsException.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException/VB/ConfigurationErrorsException.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Errors As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Errors { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取详细描述引发此 异常的原因的错误集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of errors that detail the reasons this exception was thrown.

value.span: 对象，包含标识引发此 异常的原因的错误。

span.span: An object that contains errors that identify the reasons this exception was thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性收集在操作期间可能发生的尽可能多的错误，例如读取配置文件。The property collects as many errors as possible that might occur during an operation, such as reading a configuration file. 引发的异常只显示第一个错误。The exception thrown shows only the first error. 您可以访问 以查看所有发出的错误。You can access to see all the errors issued.

span.span: The path to the configuration file that caused this to be thrown.

summary.span: 获取引发此配置异常时正在读取的配置文件的路径。

span.span: Gets the path to the configuration file being read when this configuration exception was thrown.

summary.span: 获取引发此配置异常时从中加载内部 对象的配置文件的路径。

span.span: Gets the path to the configuration file from which the internal object was loaded when this configuration exception was thrown.

returns.span: 引发此配置异常时从中加载内部 对象的配置文件的路径。

span.span: The path to the configuration file from which the internal object was loaded when this configuration exception was thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回配置文件的名称，该配置文件包含 发生异常时正在分析的对象。The method returns the name of the configuration file that contains the object being parsed when the exception occurred.

summary.span: 用发生此配置异常处的文件名和行号设置 对象。

span.span: Sets the object with the file name and line number at which this configuration exception occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置一个 对象，该对象具有发生此异常的文件名和行号 。The method sets a object with the file name and line number at which this exception occurred. 在反序列化期间，将 从 通过流传输的对象重建异常。During deserialization, the exception is reconstituted from the object that is transmitted over the stream.
